attributes.description: This dashboard shows Offenses collected by the IBM QRadar Integration.

params.markdown:
This dashboard provides centralized visibility into offenses detected in IBM QRadar.

It features a Control Panel that displays status, activation, and protection state. Key metrics highlight the total number of Active and Protected Offenses. Offense trends are visualized with a bar chart for severity distribution and a pie chart for status breakdown. Detailed insights are provided through tables showing the top rule types, top assignees, top log source types, top log source names, and top offense sources. For deeper investigation, a saved search delivers essential offense details. Together, these visualizations provide both high-level monitoring and actionable insights to support offense analysis and response.

**[Integration Page](/app/integrations/detail/ibm_qradar)**

attributes.title: [Logs IBM QRadar] Offense
